name: Pumpkin Paws
description:
Enjoy the return of the Autumn weather with Pumpkin the Corgi as he spends the day exploring his garden and prepping for the season!

This is a small collectathon in which Pumpkin needs to go around the garden and find numerous seasonal items before returning to his bed for a midday nap. This game was made over the course of a few days in Unity for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022 and is my first submission to any game jam, so any feedback would be really appreciated!

Controls

  • WASD - Walk
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Tab - View Inventory
  • Mouse - Camera Controls

Objective

Walk around the garden and find the 5 objects highlighted in your inventory! Once you've got them, Pumpkin will probably be feeling a bit tired, so best to return to his bed

Future Plans

Since getting back into Unity with this project for the game jam it's renewed my interest in building more with the engine, so I'll be taking the learnings about third person controllers, environment building, and more either into updates for this project or a brand new one.
